pages.text: Using the same steps that you used to connect your instrument(s) to the FileCaster, your friends can connect their instrument(s) and play along with you!$(br2)In the same way, if your friend is using a FileCaster you can connect your instrument(s) to them!$(br2)

By playing together with friends you can have many more than 3 instruments playing at the same time (up to 16).$(br2)Note that you must be within 16 blocks of other players in order for their instruments to receive transmissions from your FileCaster.
